main.itemsim

Class LinearSimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.itemsim.LinearSimilarity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimilarityMeasure

    public class LinearSimilarity
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimilarityMeasure
    compute the similarity of two items using a specific similarity metric: sim (i, j) = 0.5 * cosine(i,j) + 0.4 * jaccard(i,j) + 0.1 * simprice(i,j)
